pgrid.core.maintenance.loadbalancing
Class ReplicationBalancer

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.util.WorkerThread
      pgrid.core.maintenance.loadbalancing.ReplicationBalancer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, MessageWaiter
public class ReplicationBalancer
extends WorkerThread
implements MessageWaiter

This class represents the replication balancer for load balancing in P-Grid.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

cloneRandomPeer

public void cloneRandomPeer(Collection hosts)
This method will ask a random peer to find an overloaded partition, if it cannot find one, the random peer will be cloned.

Parameters:
hosts - a list of random peers

remoteSearchPath

public void remoteSearchPath(PGridHost host,
                             SearchPathMessage msg)
Invoked when a remote search path message was received.

Parameters:
host - the sending host.
msg - the received message.

searchPathAndClone

protected void searchPathAndClone(int level)
Searches for a suitable peer to clone if the local peer decided to balance load.

Parameters:
level - the level to search for a peer to clone.

processLocalReply

protected void processLocalReply(pgrid.core.maintenance.loadbalancing.ReplicationBalancer.Request request)
Process an incomming reply message triggered by searchPathAndClone method

Parameters:
request - contains the reply message

updateStatistics

public void updateStatistics(int commonLen,
                             int currentLen,
                             int lLen,
                             int rLen)
Updates the statistics during an exchange.

Parameters:
commonLen - the common length of exchanging peers.
currentLen - the current length of a previous peer.
lLen - the remaining length of the local path (path.len-commonLen).
rLen - the remaining length of the remote path (path.len-commonLen).

searchPathReply - the message
